method: Mix all the ingredients together until thoroughly combined. Transfer to a sealed plastic tub and keep in the fridge.
ingredients: 150g/5oz whole wheat pasta, cooked according to packet instructions,  150g/5oz frozen or tinned sweetcorn ,  150g/5Â½oz tinned tuna in spring water, drained,  2 tbsp plain yoghurt,  1 tbsp mayonnaise,  freshly ground black pepper,  squeeze lemon (optional)
